page.title: 15CLUBS
page.content:
We have lots of clubs in Chedworth.
The boys go to{cubs}after school on Wednesdays. They do lots of activities one is trail. All the{cubs}are put into groups with the oldest{cub} leader. Then we have bits of string in different colours for each group,they have to follow the strings until they lead to a bag of sweets then you dash back for drinks
For the younger girls there is {brownies.}There are about seventeen people most of them from our school. We earn badges, for example the Safety in the Home Badge. We are learning about safe and unsafe homes and how to light fires properly. I have three badges, Venture,Footpath and Hostess
The older girls go to{guides}on a
